__e: Well, I'm retired now. It doesn't really matter.
Now, where the hell is my brother?
I thought you were dead or retired.
He says he's retired, so I am the family head, and I am to do what I think is right.
Being retired and being out of the game are two very different things, my dear.
You didn't shoot yourself, did you?
Well, my father is a retired captain of police.
And you are a retired... NYPD detective, correct?
You could have retired from your life.
